title: How to turn of overlaying relaxation sounds
content:
Since one week now, when I connect my Pixel Buds (2020) to my Pixel 5, suddenly relaxation sounds which are pretty loud are playing. 
Sometimes it starts at 11 AM or at 14 PM. 
Also, the google assistant tells me after some time always that she cant currently read my notifications.
The music is playing non-stop over every other sound -> phone call, spotify, voice mails, etc.

What I tried:
1.) Turn several applications off and uninstall Spotify 
2.) Restart the phone.
3.) Disconnect Ear Buds (music continues on speakers)
4.) Sleeping time settings of clock app.

Any idea what the problem is?
